column4: so does anyone else think the new nautilus is erm..ugly? the way the sidepane cuts up towards the titlebar bothers me
poll here, yes, I went debian/lubuntu
i won't go lubuntu because i don't like lxde...i really do love unity i just wish nautilus hadn't been "uglified"
I see, but let's (if so) keep it out here (#ubuntu-offtopic)
